TextLibrary.Text: You lose, Minogoth. Now... tell me where they're taking the slaves!
You lose, Minogoth. Now... tell me where they're taking the slaves!
You lose, Minogoth. Now... tell me where they're taking the slaves!
You lose, Minogoth. Now... tell me where they're taking the slaves!
They are for my master, Lord Bane. He takes all the metal and slaves we can send him.
They are for my master, Lord Bane. He takes all the metal and slaves we can send him.
They are for my master, Lord Bane. He takes all the metal and slaves we can send him.
They are for my master, Lord Bane. He takes all the metal and slaves we can send him.
Why? What is he using them for?
Why? What is he using them for?
Why? What is he using them for?
Why? What is he using them for?
Ah! You will soon find out!
Ah! You will soon find out!
Ah! You will soon find out!
Ah! You will soon find out!
